bibl.title: The 'Barbarian' Names on the Third-Century Ostraka from Xeron.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Blemmyan personal names from the fifth- and sixth-century sources. - The personal names in the third-century ostraka from Xeron. - A comparative analysis of both corpora. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Inside and Out. Interactions between Rome and the Peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian Frontiers in Late Antiquity

bibl.seg: Helmut Satzinger, The 'Barbarian' Names on the Third-Century Ostraka from Xeron.

Jitse H.F. Dijkstra & Greg Fisher (edd.), Inside and Out. Interactions between Rome and the Peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian Frontiers in Late Antiquity = Late Antique History and Religion. 8 (Leuven, 2014) pp. 199-212, 2 tabl.

Introduction. - Blemmyan personal names from the fifth- and sixth-century sources. - The personal names in the third-century ostraka from Xeron. - A comparative analysis of both corpora. - Conclusion.
